sub_rules.content: Block comments are indented at the same level as the surrounding code
sub_rules.formalization: the quantity of Block comments.annotation must be equal to surrounding code.annotation

sub_rules.content: For multi-line /* ... */ comments, subsequent lines must start with * aligned with the * on the previous line.
sub_rules.formalization: before multi-line comments.line must be * ∧ line.star.arrangement must be constrained to be aligned

sub_rules.content: Comments are not enclosed in boxes drawn with asterisks or other characters.
sub_rules.formalization: comment must not be contained in box_drawing_characters
